text: "Shadows" is the third single to be taken from The Getaway Plan's debut album Other Voices, Other Rooms. In Australia, only 1000 copies were made and the single is considered rare.http://www.sanity.com.au/product/product.asp?sku=2118349 ==Track listings== ;CD Singlehttp://www.sanity.com.au/product/product.asp?sku=2118349 # "Shadows" - 3:41 # "Melophobia" - 3:46 # "Teardrop" (Massive Attack cover) \- 5:36 ==Charts== As the single was limited to a distributed 1000 copies it mostly relied on downloads to chart. As the single was popular on radio, it was successful in charting. {| class="wikitable" border="1" |- ! Year ! Chart !
